languages.text: "Ложь Архиврага принимает множество обликов — но чудеса Императора стократ сильнее. Не раз и не два Он ниспосылал озарение верующим, даже будь они самого низкого рождения. Я сама ношу имя бедной сироты, получившей по Его воле чудотворные силы. Так дайте мне время — я найду вернейших людей для сопровождения брата Чистоголосого в его странствиях. Они уберегут его, если он чист, и покарают, если почувствуют ложь в его словах. Но предчувствие говорит мне — его перерождение есть подлинное чудо!"

traits.locale_text: "Ложь Архиврага принимает множество обликов — но чудеса Императора стократ сильнее. Не раз и не два Он ниспосылал озарение верующим, даже будь они самого низкого рождения. Я сама ношу имя бедной сироты, получившей по Его воле чудовторные силы. Так дайте мне время — я найду вернейших людей для охраны брата Чистоголосого. Они уберегут его, если он чист, и покарают, если почувствуют ложь в его словах. Но предчувствие говорит мне — его видения есть подлинное чудо!"

languages.text: "The Archenemy's lies take on many guises — but the Emperor's miracles are a hundredfold stronger. On more than a few occasions, He has bestowed epiphanies upon the faithful, even those of the humblest origin. I myself bear the name of a poor orphan who was granted miraculous powers by His grace. So, give me time, and I will find you the most loyal agents to escort Brother Pure-Voice on his travels. They will keep him safe if he is pure, or punish him should they sense deceit in his words. But I have a feeling that his rebirth is a true wonder!"
languages.original_text: "Ложь Архиврага принимает множество обликов — но чудеса Императора стократ сильнее. Не раз и не два Он ниспосылал озарение верующим, даже будь они самого низкого рождения. traits.locale_text: "The Archenemy's lies take on many guises — but the Emperor's miracles are a hundredfold stronger. On more than a few occasions, He has bestowed epiphanies upon the faithful, even those of the humblest origin. My own name is that of a poor orphan who was granted miraculous powers by His grace. So give me time, and I will find you people most loyal who will guard Brother Pure-Voice. They will keep him safe if he is pure, or punish him should they sense lies in his words. But I have a feeling that his visions are a true wonder!"

languages.text: «Las mentiras del Archienemigo adoptan muchos aspectos, pero los milagros del Emperador son cien veces mayores. En numerosas ocasiones ha otorgado epifanías a los fieles, incluso a los de orígenes humildes. Yo misma llevo el nombre de una pobre huérfana a la que su gracia concedió poderes milagrosos. Deme tiempo y encontraré a los agentes más fieles para que escolten al hermano Voz Pura en sus viajes. Si de verdad es puro lo protegerán y si perciben el engaño en sus palabras lo castigarán. ¡Pero creo que su renacer es un auténtico milagro!».
languages.original_text: "The Archenemy's lies take on many guises — but the Emperor's miracles are a hundredfold stronger. On more than a few occasions, He has bestowed epiphanies upon the faithful, even those of the humblest origin. I myself bear the name of a poor orphan who was granted miraculous powers by His grace. So, give me time, and I will find you the most loyal agents to escort Brother Pure-Voice on his travels. They will keep him safe if he is pure, or punish him should they sense deceit in his words. But I have a feeling that his rebirth is a true wonder!"

traits.locale_text: «Las mentiras del Archienemigo adoptan muchos aspectos, pero los milagros del Emperador son cien veces mayores. En numerosas ocasiones ha otorgado epifanías a los fieles, incluso a los de orígenes humildes. Yo misma llevo el nombre de una pobre huérfana a la que su gracia concedió poderes milagrosos. Deme tiempo y encontraré a los agentes más fieles para que escolten al hermano Voz Pura en sus viajes. Si de verdad es puro lo protegerán y si perciben el engaño en sus palabras lo castigarán. ¡Pero creo que su renacer es un auténtico milagro!».

languages.text: « Les mensonges du Grand Ennemi peuvent prendre de nombreux visages, mais les miracles de l'Empereur les surpassent aisément. Il lui est maintes fois arrivé de bénir Ses fidèles, d'aussi basse extraction soient-ils, de Ses révélations sacrées. Moi-même, je porte le nom d'une pauvre orpheline ayant reçu des pouvoirs miraculeux de Sa grâce en personne. Accordez-moi simplement un peu de temps, et je trouverai des agents loyaux qui seront à même d'escorter le frère à la voix pure dans ses pérégrinations. S'il est pur, ils veilleront sur sa vie ; s'ils sentent la moindre tromperie en lui, ils le châtieront. En ce qui me concerne, j'ai le sentiment que sa renaissance est un émerveillement absolu ! »
languages.original_text: "The Archenemy's lies take on many guises — but the Emperor's miracles are a hundredfold stronger. On more than a few occasions, He has bestowed epiphanies upon the faithful, even those of the humblest origin. I myself bear the name of a poor orphan who was granted miraculous powers by His grace. So, give me time, and I will find you the most loyal agents to escort Brother Pure-Voice on his travels. They will keep him safe if he is pure, or punish him should they sense deceit in his words. But I have a feeling that his rebirth is a true wonder!"

traits.locale_text: « Les mensonges du Grand Ennemi peuvent prendre de nombreux visages, mais les miracles de l'Empereur les surpassent aisément. Il lui est maintes fois arrivé de bénir Ses fidèles, d'aussi basse extraction soient-ils, de Ses révélations sacrées. Moi-même, je porte le nom d'une pauvre orpheline ayant reçu des pouvoirs miraculeux de Sa grâce en personne. Accordez-moi simplement un peu de temps, et je trouverai des agents loyaux qui seront à même d'escorter le frère à la voix pure dans ses pérégrinations. S'il est pur, ils veilleront sur sa vie ; s'ils sentent la moindre tromperie en lui, ils le châtieront. En ce qui me concerne, j'ai le sentiment que sa renaissance est un émerveillement absolu ! »

languages.text: “混沌大敌的诡计千变万化，神皇的奇迹却较之百倍强大。神皇的光辉无数次地照耀祂忠贞的信徒，即便是出身最卑微的底层民众，也能沐浴祂的明光。我自己就曾是个贫困潦倒的孤儿，但却凭祂的恩典获得了奇迹般的力量。因此，请给我一些时间，我会为您找到最忠诚的特工，护送纯洁之声兄弟出行。他若纯洁，必得护佑；他若出言伪诈，必将受罚。但平心而论，我相信他的重生是真正的神迹！”
languages.original_text: "The Archenemy's lies take on many guises — but the Emperor's miracles are a hundredfold stronger. On more than a few occasions, He has bestowed epiphanies upon the faithful, even those of the humblest origin. I myself bear the name of a poor orphan who was granted miraculous powers by His grace. So, give me time, and I will find you the most loyal agents to escort Brother Pure-Voice on his travels. They will keep him safe if he is pure, or punish him should they sense deceit in his words. But I have a feeling that his rebirth is a true wonder!"

traits.locale_text: “混沌大敌的诡计千变万化，神皇的奇迹却较之百倍强大。神皇的光辉无数次地照耀祂忠贞的信徒，即便是出身最卑微的底层民众，也能沐浴祂的明光。我自己就曾是个贫困潦倒的孤儿，但却凭祂的恩典获得了奇迹般的力量。因此，请给我一些时间，我会为您找到最忠诚的特工，护送纯洁之声兄弟出行。他若纯洁，必得护佑；他若出言伪诈，必将受罚。但平心而论，我相信他的重生是真正的神迹！”

languages.text: 「渾沌の勢力の嘘は様々な形をとりますが、皇帝の奇跡はその百倍強い。幾度となく、皇帝は信心深い人々に啓示を授けてきました。私自身、主の恩寵によって奇跡的な力を授かった貧しい孤児です。だから、時間をください。純声の同胞団の護衛をする、最も忠実なエージェントを探します。彼らは彼が純粋であれば安全を守り、彼の言葉に欺瞞を感じれば罰するでしょう。しかし、私は彼の再誕が真の驚異であることを予感しています！」
languages.original_text: "The Archenemy's lies take on many guises — but the Emperor's miracles are a hundredfold stronger. On more than a few occasions, He has bestowed epiphanies upon the faithful, even those of the humblest origin. I myself bear the name of a poor orphan who was granted miraculous powers by His grace. So, give me time, and I will find you the most loyal agents to escort Brother Pure-Voice on his travels. They will keep him safe if he is pure, or punish him should they sense deceit in his words. But I have a feeling that his rebirth is a true wonder!"

traits.locale_text: 「渾沌の勢力の嘘は様々な形をとりますが、皇帝の奇跡はその百倍強い。幾度となく、皇帝は信心深い人々に啓示を授けてきました。私自身、主の恩寵によって奇跡的な力を授かった貧しい孤児です。だから、時間をください。純声の同胞団の護衛をする、最も忠実なエージェントを探します。彼らは彼が純粋であれば安全を守り、彼の言葉に欺瞞を感じれば罰するでしょう。しかし、私は彼の再誕が真の驚異であることを予感しています！」

languages.text: "Die Lügen des Erzfeinds nehmen vielerlei Formen an — doch die Wunder des Imperators sind einhundert Mal stärker. Schon oft hat er die Gläubigen mit großer Erkenntnis gesegnet, selbst jene von bescheidenster Herkunft. Ich selbst trage den Namen eines armen Waisen, der von seiner Erhabenheit wundersame Kräfte geschenkt bekommen hat. Also gebt mir Zeit, dann finde ich Euch die treuesten Agenten, die Bruder Reine-Stimme auf seinen Reisen begleiten. Sie werden ihn beschützen, wenn er rein ist, oder bestrafen, sollten sie in seinen Worten Täuschung erkennen. Ich habe jedoch das Gefühl, dass seine Wiedergeburt ein wahres Wunder ist!"
languages.original_text: "The Archenemy's lies take on many guises — but the Emperor's miracles are a hundredfold stronger. On more than a few occasions, He has bestowed epiphanies upon the faithful, even those of the humblest origin. I myself bear the name of a poor orphan who was granted miraculous powers by His grace. So, give me time, and I will find you the most loyal agents to escort Brother Pure-Voice on his travels. They will keep him safe if he is pure, or punish him should they sense deceit in his words. But I have a feeling that his rebirth is a true wonder!"

languages.text: "Şerbaşı'nın yalanları pek çok kılığa bürünür ancak İmparator'un mucizeleri, onlardan yüzlerce kat güçlüdür. O, birden fazla hadisede en mütevazı kökenlere sahip olsalar bile inançlılara aydınlanma bahşetmiştir. Ben de O'nun lütfuyla mucizevi güçler bahşedilen zavallı bir yetimin adını aldım. Bana vakit verirsen sana Rahip Durusöz'e yolculuklarında eşlik edecek en sadık ajanları getiririm. Saflığı hakikiyse onu güvende tutarlar, sözlerinde en ufak bir hile saptarlarsa onu cezalandırırlar. Fakat içimde bu yeniden doğuşun hakiki bir mucize olduğuna dair bir his var!"
languages.original_text: "The Archenemy's lies take on many guises — but the Emperor's miracles are a hundredfold stronger. On more than a few occasions, He has bestowed epiphanies upon the faithful, even those of the humblest origin. I myself bear the name of a poor orphan who was granted miraculous powers by His grace. So, give me time, and I will find you the most loyal agents to escort Brother Pure-Voice on his travels. They will keep him safe if he is pure, or punish him should they sense deceit in his words. But I have a feeling that his rebirth is a true wonder!"
